eb:/ipfs/QmVxWqQJ41NTqqRp49mXriEbvJrHqsGWjAmJtxtXFHGUEb"]},"contracts/src/interfaces/IRevenuePool.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4f1694b37663e85dfc727cb84303ffabbdb4d6dce0118e6bd1f2702e78ed580c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9cd95acee543044a666d762b8e710053486172bb26d5c06f2497fabb2de779ea","dweb:/ipfs/QmYaijk8rHZic3emsncAw24RjfnE3ojJC7uxDeNY9HpHCw"]}},"version":1}

claimRevenue(uint256).details: Double-claim protection ensures each creator can only claim once per epoch.      Transfers both ETH and USDC shares if available.

params.epoch: The epoch number to claim revenue for

params._scoreSubmitter: The address authorized to submit epoch scores
params._usdc: The USDC token contract address on Base

deposit().details: Accepts ETH via msg.value and credits it to the current epoch's revenue

depositUSDC(uint256).details: Transfers USDC from sender and credits it to the current epoch's revenue

params.amount: The amount of USDC to deposit (in USDC decimals)

returns._0: The total claimable amount (ETH + USDC combined value)

returns.creatorShare: The creator's share (50%) of the total revenue
returns.finalized: Whether the epoch has been finalized
returns.total: The total revenue deposited in the epoch

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newDuration: The new epoch duration in seconds

submitEpochScores(uint256,address[],uint.details: Only callable by the authorized score submitter. Calculates each creator's      proportional share of 50% of the epoch's total revenue based on their scores.

params.scores: Array of creator scores (must match creators array length)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

CREATOR_SHARE_BPS().notice: Creator share percentage in basis points (50% = 5000)

claimRevenue(uint256).notice: Claim revenue for a finalized epoch using pull pattern

deposit().notice: Deposit ETH into the revenue pool for the current epoch

depositUSDC(uint256).notice: Deposit USDC into the revenue pool for the current epoch

genesisTimestamp().notice: Timestamp when the first epoch started

getClaimable(address,uint256).notice: Get the claimable amount for a creator in a specific epoch

getCurrentEpoch().notice: Get the current epoch number based on genesis timestamp and epoch duration

getEpochRevenue(uint256).notice: Get revenue details for a specific epoch

scoreSubmitter().notice: The address authorized to submit epoch scores

setScoreSubmitter(address).notice: Update the score submitter address (owner only)

submitEpochScores(uint256,address[],uint.notice: Submit creator scores for an epoch and finalize revenue distribution

usdc().notice: The USDC token contract on Base
